modName: Combat Ranger Wood Elf Companion Tammy NSFW ADULT
summary: Adds a Combat Ranger Wood Elf Companion to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod to share, so be easy on me, I\'m just an old geezer trying to have some fun.  :)  If there is any interest I\'ll upload some other followers I\'ve made.

To look like she does in the pictures:
DIMONIZED UNP female body UNP Base Main body V1dot2 by dimon99 here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Better Females version 3 Makeup Version 3 and No Shine by BellaGail here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Natural Eyes with Elves Alternative Eyes by nevenbridge here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589
She comes with a full set of Nightingale Gear, if you want her look like the pictures use UNP - Ultra Skimpy Armor by Nightasy here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9546
To hide helmets I use Hidden Helms by z999z3mystorys here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13349

Without at least UNP body, Bella\'s faces, and Natural Eyes, you could end up with grey face or worse.

Required:
Requires ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii, without it you\'ll CTD, found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

She is set to
Lvl 1 auto lvl
Weight 40
Essential
Combat Ranger

If you want to change her gear, stats, make her nonessential, I suggest Extensible Follower Framework by Expired, found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933, don\'t install with NMM though, download the NMM version, unzip it, and copy XFLMain.esm, XFLMain.bsa, XFLDialogue.esp, XFLPlugins.esp, and XFLTweaks.esp to your Skyrim\\Data folder.  UFO should work too, but I prefer EFF for the group commands. 

You\'ll find her in Whiterun, she patrols the city from 0800 to 1200, and again from 1300 to 1700
From 1200 to 1300 and from 1700 to 1900 she\'ll be in Dragonsreach eating
From 1900 to 2300 she\'ll be in the Bannered Mare partying (hopefully not too much)
The picture of her eating is not staged, that\'s how I found her.

Installation is easiest with NMM
Or if you want to install manually extract someplace, click on CGTammy, copy the data folder, and paste it in your Skyrim folder.

Uninstall with NMM if you used NMM to install
Or if installed manually:
Delete:
Skyrim\\Data\\CGTammy.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\CGTammy.esp
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Actor\\Character\\facegendata\\facetint\\CGTammy.esp

Any requests for changes I\'ll try to accommodate, but changing faces\\editing followers in the CK is tricky, and can corrupt the file to point its unusable.

Credits
dimon99 for the best body
BellaGail for her face textures
nevenbridge for the great eyes
Nightasy for the great meshes on gear and his tutorials for making gear.
z999z3mystorys for setting all the helmets to hidden
Apachii for the awesome hairs.
eamico who I got the sandbox idea from

FalmerBane for inspiring me to make followers, if you\'ve never used one of his followers, you should.  They are all simply awesome.
author: CrimsonGeezer
